MWC.GUI

Class BaseLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Plottables
      • MWC.GUI.BaseLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, java.util.EventListener, CanEnumerate, Editable, HasEditables, Layer, Plottable, PlottablesType, Renamable, SupportsPropertyListeners
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChartFolio, CoverageLayer, DynamicLayer, DynamicShapeLayer, DynamicTrackShapeSetWrapper, ETOPOPainter, ExternallyManagedDataLayer, GPackage, LibraryLayer, SpatialRasterPainter, SplittableLayer, VPFDatabase, WorldPathDetailEditor.PathPlotter

    public class BaseLayer
extends Plottables
implements Layer, SupportsPropertyListeners
    this class is a collection of objects which may be plotted to a Chart
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.10 $
    See Also:
    Plottables, Plottable, Serialized Form
